Eligible Cards

All SBI Credit Cards excluding Corporate Cards, Cashback SBI Credit Card & SBI PayTm Credit Cards, UPI Transactions done through SBI Rupay Credit Cards.

Don’t have an SBI Card? Apply Now

Summary
Flat ₹200 Instant Discount on www.abhibus.com/ & abhibus mobile app on Thursdays & Fridays
Min. Transaction: ₹2000; Max. Discount Per Card: ₹ 200 Per Transaction
Promo Code: SBICAB
Offer is valid once per card per month.
Offer not applicable on Government SRTC bus ticket bookings.
Steps to avail this offer

Visit https://www.abhibus.com or Abhibus Mobile APP ⇒ Select Travel Destinations of your choice ⇒ Enter the details ⇒ Apply the Promo Code & proceed with payment using your SBI credit card.
